paper.label: abneyjohnson91
paper.authors: Steven P. Abney and Mark Johnson
paper.title: Memory Requirements and Local Ambiguities of Parsing Strategies
paper.summary: This paper describes the effect that different parsing strategies have on memory requirements in parsers, as well as their effects on local ambiguities while parsing.

paper.label: miller09naacl
paper.summary: This is a paper describing some syntactic transforms that allow for more natural representation of unfinished constituents in speech repairs.
paper.title: Improved Syntactic Models for Parsing Speech Repair
